remarks: Utility lemma for Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 115.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2012.)
statement:
cdleme18d.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme18d.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme18d.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme18d.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme18d.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme18d.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme18d.f $e |- F = ( ( S .\/ U ) ./\ ( Q .\/ ( ( P .\/ S ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
cdleme18d.g $e |- G = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ ( F .\/ ( ( R .\/ S ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
cdleme22.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdleme22gb $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( R e. A /\ S e. A ) ) -> G e. B ) $.
